entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 31 December 2022
